footer.tagline: Connecting gamers, building communities, creating legends.

home.subtitle: Swipe. Match. Game Together.
home.lead: The ultimate platform for gamers to find their perfect teammates, build lasting communities, and level up their gaming experience.
home.featuresSub: Discover features designed to connect gamers and build the ultimate gaming community
home.feature1Desc: Our AI-powered algorithm matches you with gamers who share your playstyle, skill level, and gaming preferences.
home.feature2Desc: Connect across PC, PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and mobile. Find teammates regardless of your platform.
home.feature3Desc: Create or join gaming communities, organize tournaments, and build lasting friendships with fellow gamers.
home.howSub: Finding your gaming squad has never been easier
home.how1Desc: Set up your gaming profile with your favorite games, skill level, and what you're looking for in teammates.
home.how2Desc: Browse through potential teammates and communities. Swipe right on profiles that interest you.
home.how3Desc: Start chatting, plan gaming sessions, and build your ultimate gaming squad for epic adventures.
home.ctaSub: Join the gaming revolution and connect with players who share your passion
home.ctaFoot: Available on iOS and Android â€¢ Free to download

waitlist.note: Be the first to know when Gamerplug launches!

games.title: Popular Games
games.subtitle: Find your gaming community in the most popular titles. Connect with players who share your passion and skill level.
games.notFound: No games found. Please check back later.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions about Gamerplug? Need support? We're here to help you connect with the gaming community.
contact.emailDesc: Need help with your account, have a question, or want to report an issue? Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.followDesc: Stay updated with the latest news, features, and community highlights. Follow us on Twitter for real-time updates and gaming tips.
contact.faqSub: Common questions about Gamerplug and how to get started

profile.userNotFoundBody: The user you're looking for doesn't exist.
